department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Bird's head with long beak and long neck; holds round object in beak; cock's comb on top of head, curcular ear-like elements on either side of head, two rings around neck; attached to wooden base
dimension: 2 1/2 x 7/8 x 1 9/16 in. (6.35 x 2.22 x 3.97 cm) (including base)
markings: White paint, back of neck, \'589\'; sticker, under transparent tape on bottom of base, \'589\'
title: Goldweight [Bird's Head]
